product_name: Helly Hansen Odin Moon Light Rain Jacket - Men's
long_description: Designed for year-round waterproof, windproof, breathable protection, the men's Helly Hansen Odin Moon Light Rain Jacket for men is one you'll gladly carry on hikes and other adventures. Helly Tech(R) Performance 2.5-ply laminate construction is fully seam sealed and provides waterproof, breathable protection. Durable water repellent finish beads up moisture so it rolls off. Water-resistant zippers on center front, hand pockets and chest pocket. Full-length front stormflap and adjustments on hood, cuffs and hem let you seal out weather. Helly Hansen Odin Moon Light Rain Jacket for men offers underarm vents to prevent overheating.
short_description: Designed for year-round waterproof, windproof, breathable protection, the men's Helly Hansen Odin Moon Light Rain Jacket for men is one you'll gladly carry on hikes and other adventures.
